title: Surge in interest towards secluded, nature-centric retreats post pandemic: Naad Wellness
description: The company that started its operations in 2018, has around 50-60% occupancy at its property in the National Capital Region(Delhi NCR). It is exploring targeted marketing initiatives, strategic partnerships, and innovative wellness programs to further enhance occupancy levels.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
